name: You AreDoomed!
description:
My first game in godot went away camping so only had 3 days to complete, this was also my first 3d game, paying homage to the 1990's game doom.

Basic first person horror, The enemy can phase through walls, going through doors will alert him. Find the numbers along the walls to get the right code.

sorry the menu ui is ugly first time in  godot

Play in full screen!!
